article.headline: Mercer secures 86-72 victory over West Georgia
article.description: — Tyler Johnson's 24 points helped Mercer defeat West Georgia 86-72 on Wednesday.
article.linkText: Mercer secures 86-72 victory over West Georgia

images.name: Kolten Griffin posterizes Mercer defender
images.caption: Kolten Griffin puts a Mercer defender on a poster after a wild fast-break sequence.

video.headline: Kolten Griffin posterizes Mercer defender
video.caption: Kolten Griffin puts a Mercer defender on a poster after a wild fast-break sequence.
video.title: Kolten Griffin posterizes Mercer defender
video.description: Kolten Griffin puts a Mercer defender on a poster after a wild fast-break sequence.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Kolten Griffin posterizes Mercer defender) 2024/12/04 ESHEET

article.story: MACON, Ga. -- — Tyler Johnson's 24 points helped Mercer defeat West Georgia 86-72 on Wednesday. Johnson added five rebounds for the Bears (4-4). Ahmad Robinson scored 13 points and added five rebounds. Alex Holt had 12 points and shot 5 of 6 from the field and 2 of 4 from the free-throw line. The Wolves (0-10) were led by Shelton Williams-Dryden, who posted 23 points and 11 rebounds. Demetrus Johnson II added 12 points for West Georgia. Rickey Ballard also put up 11 points. ------ The Associated Press created this story using technology provided by Data Skrive and data from Sportradar.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
